## BaseDashboard.layout() method

Override this method to define the layout of the widget in the dashboard.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected layout(): JSX.Element | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

JSX.Element \| undefined

The layout of the widget in the dashboard.
